name: SpringHell
description:
Just Press Spacebar at the right time!
It’s very simple arcade game with tiny puzzle and platformer.

The Ghost (player character) move automatically and change direction when hit the wall.
You have to avoid red spring traps to go down the map with jump!
Don’t forget to eat the flowers on your way down

How to Play

- If you press Spacebar, the ghost jumps. You can jump long and short depending on the time you press, so please use it according to the situation.

- When you step on the red spring trap, the ghost jumps up and flies away. Please be careful because you can going back the way You've been working hard. The spring can be stepped on continuously and can also be moved back to the beginning.

- When you land on the floor after stepping on the spring, the ghost faints and stops. Press Space bar again to wake up the ghost
